   <a target="_blank" href="/school-counselors-members/asca-national-model">ASCA National Model</a></span><img alt="ASCA National Model" src="/asca/media/asca/home/pic1.png?width=202&height=202&ext=.png" />

<div class="box-photo"><span class="blue-box-header">
   <a target="_blank" href="/School-Counselors-Members/Professional-Development.aspx">Professional Development</a></span><img alt="Professional Development" src="/asca/media/asca/home/LEARN-pic-4.png?width=202&height=202&ext=.png" /> 
</div>


</div>

    <div class="home-left-column">
        <p><b>Position Statements Public Comment Period: </b>Read the draft versions of the 2018 position statements and provide comment by March 30, 2018. <a href="/school-counselors-members/publications/position-statements">Learn more</a>.<br />
<br />
<b>Standards Public Comment Period:</b>&nbsp;ASCA&#39;s School Counselor Preparation Program Standards are a unified set of principles guiding&nbsp;school counselor preparation programs in training effective future school counselors in areas of professional practice and ethical behavior. Public comment period on the preparation program standards is open until April 11, 2018. <a href="/school-counselors/professional-development/learn-more/asca-school-counselor-preparation-program-standard" target="_blank">Learn more</a>.<br />
<br />
<b><img alt="" src="/asca/media/asca/SCOY/MO-livestream2018.jpg" style="float: left; margin: 10px;" />Watch the School Counselor of the Year Event: </b><br />
Relive the 2018&nbsp;School Counselor of the Year celebration at the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, with featured guest Michelle Obama. <a href="https://videos.schoolcounselor.org/2018-kennedy-center-school-counselor-of-the-year-celebration" target="_blank">Watch it here.</a>&nbsp;Download&nbsp;pictures from 2018 School Counselor of the Year events <a href="https://www.flickr.com/photos/americanschoolcounselorassociation/albums/72157665567439388" target="_blank">here</a>.<br />
<br />
<b>Student-to-School-Counselor Ratios: </b>Although ASCA recommends a 250:1 ratio, the national average for the 2014-2015 school year was&nbsp;482:1. <a href="/asca/media/asca/home/Ratios14-15.pdf">See how your state stacks up</a>.&nbsp;<br />
<br />
<strong><img alt="" src="/asca/media/asca/Publications/Elements-of-Success-Cover.jpg" style="float: left; margin: 0px 10px;" />Elements of Success:</strong> Learn what makes a successful school in a new publication by the Learning First Alliance, a consortium of education associations, including ASCA. <a href="/asca/media/asca/Publications/ElementsofSuccess.pdf" target="_blank">Download &quot;The Elements of Success: 10 Million Speak on Schools That Work.&quot;</a><br />
<br />
<b>Helping Students After Crisis: </b><a href="/school-counselors-members/professional-development/learn-more/school-shooting">Get resources for helping students</a> in the aftermath of a shooting.&nbsp;<a href="/school-counselors-members/professional-development/learn-more/helping-students-after-a-hurricane" target="_blank">Get resources for helping students</a> in the aftermath of hurricanes and floods.&nbsp;<a href="/school-counselors-members/professional-development/learn-more/helping-students-after-election" target="_blank">Get resources</a> for helping students deal with troubling issues in the news.<br />
<br />
<b>2017-2018&nbsp;Awareness Dates: </b><a href="/asca/media/asca/home/2017-18AwarenessCalendar.pdf">Download</a> the calendar for the 2017-2018&nbsp;Health and Education Awareness Dates.</p>

<p><span style="color: rgb(42, 99, 161); font-family: CardoRegular, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 20px;">Follow Us</span></p>

<p><a href="http://www.facebook.com/pages/American-School-Counselor-Association/77096899005"><img alt="" src="/cmstemplates/asca/images/content_images/facebook.png" /></a> <a href="https://twitter.com/#!/ASCAtweets"><img alt="" src="/cmstemplates/asca/images/content_images/twitter.png" /></a> <a href="http://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=121084&amp;trk=hb_side_g"><img alt="" src="/cmstemplates/asca/images/content_images/linked.png" /></a>&nbsp;<a href="https://www.instagram.com/weareasca/" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="/asca/media/asca/logos/insta-logo.jpg" /></a> <a href="https://videos.schoolcounselor.org/home"><img alt="" src="https://www.schoolcounselor.org/asca/media/asca/logos/ASCATVLogo-border-sm.jpg" /></a></p>

    </div>
    
    <div class="home-right-column">
	    <h6>About ASCA</h6>

<p>The American School Counselor Association (ASCA) supports school counselors&#39; efforts to help students focus on academic, career and social/emotional development so they achieve success in school and are prepared to lead fulfilling lives as responsible members of society.<br />
<br />
ASCA provides professional development, publications and other resources, research and advocacy to professional school counselors around the globe. <a href="http://www.schoolcounselor.org/school-counselors-members/member-benefits-info">Learn more</a><a href="http://www.schoolcounselor.org/school-counselors-members/member-benefits-info"> </a>or &nbsp;<a href="/school-counselors-members/member-benefits-info/join-or-renew-today">join today!</a></p>

<div>&nbsp;</div>
&nbsp;<a href="https://www.ascaconferences.org" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="/asca/media/asca/Advertising/18webbutton.png" /></a>&nbsp;<a href="/school-counselors-members/professional-development/asca-u"><img alt="" src="/asca/media/asca/banners/ASCAUButton.jpg" /></a>
    </div>
    
    <div class="home-right-column2">
        <a class="twitter-timeline" data-widget-id="390923476489338880" href="https://twitter.com/ASCAtweets">Tweets by @ASCAtweets</a> <script type="text/javascript">!function(d,s,id){var js,fjs=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],p=/^http:/.test(d.location)?'http':'https';if(!d.getElementById(id)){js=d.createElement(s);js.id=id;js.src=p+"://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js";fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js,fjs);}}(document,"script","twitter-wjs");</script>
